title: 95/351/EC: Commission Decision of 26 July 1995 amending Decision 93/495/EEC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery products from Canada
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 July 1995 amending Decision 93/495/EEC laying down specific  conditions for importing fishery products from Canada (Text with EEA relevance) (95/351/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Annex B of Commission Decision 93/495/EEC is amended as follows:

>TABLE>
(2) The following establishments are deleted:

(3) The data of the following establishments:
>TABLE>

>TABLE>
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 July 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
